title: Idempotent Webhook Receiver
summary: FastAPI endpoint with HMAC verification, Redis dedupe keys, retries with backoff, and structured logging.
impact: Handled 10k+ events/day with 0 dupes; 99.99% success over 30 days.
notes: Request fingerprint → idempotency key in Redis (TTL)
Structured logs with request_id; basic RED metrics

title: Wiki‑Manager API for Wiki.js
summary: FastAPI service that creates/updates Wiki.js pages via API with robust path handling and markdown sanitation.
impact: Cut documentation time ~70%; consistent pages with automatic sectioning and breadcrumbs.
notes: Tested edge cases: special chars, deep paths, empty fields
JSON schemas for inputs; markdown normalization
GitHub Actions: tests + lint on PR

title: Frigate NVR on GPU VM + Coral TPU
summary: Dockerized Frigate on GPU VM with Coral USB TPU, 8 RTSP streams, object zones, and HA integration.
impact: Stable 8‑camera ingestion; detection latency <300ms; recordings offloaded to HDD to preserve VM storage.
notes: Health checks and alerts wired to ntfy

title: Proxmox System Dashboard API
summary: Flask service that pulls Proxmox metrics (nodes/VMs/LXCs) and exposes an API for a custom dark UI with an ntfy heartbeat footer.
impact: Replaced per‑host polling with unified API; faster incident triage and fewer blind spots.
notes: Token auth to Proxmox; robust error handling

title: Heartbeat Mesh (ntfy)
summary: Tiny healthcheck/heartbeat mesh: cron + shell client posts uptime and service status to ntfy; optional FastAPI relay.
impact: Early warnings for service failures; <1 min mean detection time across VMs/LXCs.

title: Slack TL;DR Bot (Local LLM via Ollama)
summary: Pulls channel messages, runs prompt‑templated summaries on a local LLM (Ollama), and returns a concise TL;DR.
impact: Cut review time for long threads significantly; local inference keeps data private.
notes: Socket Mode or webhook router variants

title: Wiki.js MCP Server for Open WebUI
summary: Custom MCP server (Python) to create/search Wiki.js pages directly from Open WebUI, enabling hands‑on docs automation.
impact: One‑click page creation from the chat UI; reduced context switching and stale docs.
notes: Unit tests for page ops; error surface to UI

title: Heart Log – AI-Powered Love Language Classifier
summary: Flask-based web app with integrated API that classifies user-submitted relationship moments into love language categories using a local Ollama LLM.
impact: Automates categorization of personal relationship entries, enabling quick reflection on patterns over time without manual tagging.
notes: Two Flask endpoints: main UI + categorization API
Prompt-engineered JSON output for consistent structure
Handles malformed responses gracefully with fallback parsing
Decoupled Ollama server over LAN for flexible deployment

title: Capybara Party
description: A whimsical Flask web app serving daily capybara-themed art and zen-like quotes generated with local AI models. Built to be playful, self-sustaining, and low-maintenance while showcasing Python backend and automation skills.
highlights: Flask backend serving daily refreshed static content (images + quotes)
AI integration: Ollama models generate inspirational quotes, Stable Diffusion generates artwork
Automated daily update pipeline with cron and file rotation
Systemd service for process management and reliability
Nginx reverse proxy for clean domain routing with SSL
Lightweight, self-contained design — minimal upkeep once deployed

title: Sunflower Log
description: A photo-journal web app to track and share the growth of a sunflower over the summer. Combines a clean Flask interface with structured logging, EXIF photo metadata extraction, and production-grade deployment behind Nginx.
highlights: Flask backend with file upload, EXIF metadata parsing, and thumbnail generation
Responsive UI with gallery-style layout for browsing photo entries
Confirmation modal on upload to prevent accidental duplicates
Deployed behind Nginx reverse proxy with custom domain and SSL
Gunicorn WSGI server managed via systemd for reliability
Organized project structure with Docker-ready configuration for future portability
CI/CD hooks for smooth updates via Git
